name: Signal Buffer Processor
description: Hybrid processor that either buffers data until a signal is received, or sends the signal. This means that you MUST always have 2 instances of this processor active, in separate branches. WARNING: IMPROPER USE OF THIS PROCESSOR WILL LEAD TO DEADLOCK!

parameters.name: signal_name
parameters.description: The unique name of the signal. This should match for signaller and signalee.

parameters.name: is_signaller
parameters.description: Whether or not this instance is a signaller. WARNING: There must always be a signaller AND a signalee!

parameters.name: node
parameters.description: The name of the node the signallee lives on. If set, the signal can be sent to a remote note from the signaller to the signalee.

parameters.name: sync
parameters.description: Whether or not the result of the remaining flow is required to be send back.
